memberdef.name: CONNECTION_TYPE_DOC
memberdef.initializer: { "outbound-full-relay (default automatic connections)", "block-relay-only (does not relay transactions or addresses)", "inbound (initiated by the peer)", "manual (added via addnode RPC or -addnode/-connect configuration options)", "addr-fetch (short-lived automatic connection for soliciting addresses)", "feeler (short-lived automatic connection for testing addresses)" }

detaileddescription.para: Join all container items. Typically used to concatenate strings but accepts containers with elements of any type.
